lefthandWords.words: The music at the club was fantastic, and the dance|Wow! We have six whole weeks of holiday. It feels|What on earth did she think she was doing?|I'd have liked to buy that designer coat,|Pete thinks the world of Sylvie,|Evie and Alan wish they hadn't misbehaved now;|The hotel we stayed in was fantastic,|It was a worldwide problem.|We were completely stunned,|The divers went down so deep

righthandWords.words: floor was absolutely packed.|like we have all the time in the world!|I can't believe Anya did that!|but it cost the earth and I didn't have enough savings.|he'll really miss her when she goes away.|they've been grounded for a week.|it was truly out of this world.|This financial problem wasn't limited to one country.|the news about the hurricane was earth-shattering.|that they saw the ocean floor.
